title: Eva Longoria cuts a super chic figure in fitted black turtleneck and high-waist trousers
text:
Last week, she was stylishly killing it at Paris Fashion Week.

And Eva Longoria's European-inspired wardrobe continued on Friday, as the star stepped out in Beverly Hills.

The 44-year-old was on her way to meet husband Jose Baston and their pals for lunch.

Striking: Eva Longoria, 44, looked timeless as she stepped out in Beverly Hills on Friday

Eva looked timeless in a fitted, black sweater tucked into a pair of high waist, wide leg trousers.

The mother-of-one accessorized with oversize shades, a Chanel handbag, and minimal items of jewelry.

The gorgeous Latina wore her brunette tresses pulled back in an effortless updo.

Fantastic taste: The mother-of-one was styled in a fitted black sweater, which she tucked into a pair of high waist, wide leg trousers

A meal with friends: The star was on her way to meet husband Jose Baston, 51, and their pals for lunch

Just last week, Eva was in Paris for Fashion Week.

The Flipped star attended the annual event with L'Oreal Paris, as she is a celebrity spokesperson for the brand.

The star stepped out in multiple stylish ensembles, including a shimmering gold dress, a satin pantsuit and blazer, and a Chanel-like dress.

Honored guest: Just last week, Eva attended Fashion Week with L'Oreal Paris, as she is a celebrity spokesperson for the brand

Joining Eva for her fashionable time in Paris was the businesswoman's young son, Santiago Baston.

She welcomed her child last year with husband Jose, whom she wed in May 2016.

Prior to their union, Eva was wed to exes Tony Parker and Tyler Christopher, while Jose to Natalia Esperon. Jose shares four children with his former wife.
description: Last week, she was stylishly killing it at Paris Fashion Week. And Eva Longoria's European-inspired wardrobe continued on Friday, as the star stepped out in Beverly Hills.
